example.eg: This round will determine which contestants go through to the final.
example.egtrans: 这一局将决定哪些选手能够晋级决赛。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 是…的决定因素, 影响, 决定

example.eg: It was then that Julia determined to swim the English Channel.
example.egtrans: 茱莉亚就是在那时决意游泳横渡英吉利海峡的。

example.eg: Charlie determined that he would do everything in his power to raise money for the charity.
example.egtrans: 查理下决心竭尽全力为慈善筹款。

example.eg: How do you determine the value of an artwork?
example.egtrans: 一件艺术作品的价值该怎么计算？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 测定, 推定, 计算

example.eg: "We must determine what exactly happened that night," said Inspector Brown.
example.egtrans: “我们必须查清当晚究竟发生了什么。”调查员布朗说。

example.eg: The club determines the rules by which it expects its members to adhere.
example.egtrans: 俱乐部规定了会员必须遵守的规则。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 支配, 对...起决定作用
